alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:49PM EST until January 27 at 1:51PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/29/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Thu 8 pm: 9.7 Forecast: Fri 1 am 11.1 Fri 7 am 11.1 Fri 1 pm 10.4 Fri 7 pm 10.4 Sat 1 am 9.0 Sat 7 am 9.0 Sat 1 pm 9.0 Sat 7 pm 7.8 Sun 1 am 7.8 Sun 7 am 7.8 Sun 1 pm 7.8 &&
